item.title: Short Bio
item.description: Here is my CV. Education Université Grenoble Alpes Master’s student in Pure Mathematics at the Institut Fourier, Université Grenoble Alpes. The topic of the Master is “Algebraic, Differential and Probabilistic Complex Geometry, Lie Groups and Discrete Groups”. For the winter semester, I am currently following a course in Algebraic Geometry (by Catriona Maclean) and Complex Differential Geometry (by Philippe Eyssidieux). University of Athens Master’s student in Pure Mathematics at the University of Athens.

item.title: Contact
item.description: email: alexandros.themelis at etu.univ-grenoble-alpes dot fr

item.title: About
item.description: Currently, I am an M2 student (2nd year MSc student) in Pure Mathematics at the Institut Fourier, Université Grenoble Alpes. The topic of the Master is “Algebraic, Differential and Probabilistic Complex Geometry, Lie Groups and Discrete Groups”. For the winter semester, I am currently following a course in Algebraic Geometry (by Catriona Maclean) and Complex Differential Geometry (by Philippe Eyssidieux). In 2025, I finished my 1st year of MSc in Pure Mathematics at the University of Athens, following core graduate courses in Algebra, Geometry and Analysis.
